TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_ami_Metuiy, title = Metuiy, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Amis]}, url = {https://ami.wikipedia.org/wiki/Metuiy} }

S.FORM: Metuiy Itiniay i Jianshi Cen no Hsinchu ko Metuiy a niyaro', 27 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 72 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 93% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin , polong han i, 67 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 7% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 5 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Tayal 85%, Paiwan 1%, Saysiyat 1%, Seediq 3%, roma 3%.

Metoiy Itiniay i Jianshi Cen no Hsincho ko Metoiy a niyaro', 27 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 72 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 93% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin , polong han i, 67 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 7% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 5 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Tayal 85%, Paiwan 1%, Saysiyat 1%, Seediq 3%, roma 3%.
